changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: assign module master list to Test Management

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'system_user_module_seq' )

column.name: system_role_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.system_role where name = 'Test Management' )

column.name: system_module_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.system_module where name = 'MasterList' )

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Changes the test reflexes that add Vironostika to instead use a script that selects between that or Innolia

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'scriptlet_seq' )

column.name: scriptlet_id
column.valueNumeric: currval( 'scriptlet_seq' )

update.where: add_test_id = (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika')

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Adds new analyte, test analyte and adjusts the sort order

update.where: test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'analyte_seq' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_analyte_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika' )

column.name: analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: currval( 'analyte_seq' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika' )

column.name: tst_rslt_id
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika' ) and cast( value as numeric ) in (select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'Positive') )

column.name: test_analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: (select max(id) from clinlims.test_analyte where test_id = (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika') )

column.name: add_test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name='Innolia' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Integral' )

column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Murex' ) and cast( value as numeric ) in (select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'Negative') )

column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.test_analyte where test_id = (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Murex') )

column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name='Innolia' )

column.valueNumeric: currval( 'test_reflex_seq' ) - 1

column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

changeSet.author: jfurlong
changeSet.comment: Add permissions for hemotology super user and validator to access Result Validation > Immunology - Hematology
changeSet.sql: insert into clinlims.system_role_module values (nextval('clinlims.system_module_seq'), 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', (select id from clinlims.system_role where name = 'Hematology Validation'), (select id from clinlims.system_module where name = 'ResultValidation:immunology')); insert into clinlims.system_role_module values (nextval('clinlims.system_module_seq'), 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', (select id from clinlims.system_role where name = 'Hematology super user'), (select id from clinlims.system_module where name = 'ResultValidation:immunology'));

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Droping invalid and indeterminate from Vironostika
changeSet.sql:
delete from clinlims.test_reflex where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika') AND tst_rslt_id in ( select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika' AND cast(value as numeric) in (select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry in ('Invalid', 'Indeterminate'))) );
update clinlims.test_result set is_active = false where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Vironostika' ) AND cast(value as numeric) in (select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry in ('Invalid', 'Indeterminate'));
